original_title: Zwillinge oder Nimm dir ein Beispiel an Evelin
overview: ‎Shortly before her eleventh birthday, Sylvia receives her own apartment key. The sensitive girl is proud of the sign of recognized self-reliance, but also unsure whether she will meet the general expectations. So far, she has been mothered like a baby, especially by her twin sister Evelin, who knows everything much better.‎
title: ‎The Twins or Take an Example of Evelin‎
